languageKey.label: SOAP tests: Current IP is proper.
SOAP tests: Current IP isn't a member of the list of allowed IPs. SOAP tests are disabled! See category DEBUGGING.

DAT SOAP administrator
  • ERROR: Access data for the external SOAP administrator are missing.
Please edit the access data in the category SOAP ADMIN.
External SOAP administrator is configured. See category SOAP ADMIN.
The pid for the fe_users is missing. See category FE_USERS.
The pid for the fe_users is wrong: There isn't any page or directory with this id. See category FE_USERS.
The pid for the fe_users is proper: page or directory is existing. See category FE_USERS.
The remove group for the fe_users is missing. New SOAP users can't cleaned up automatically. See category FE_USERS.
The remove group for the fe_users is proper. Every new DAT user will attributed to this group. Users with this group, will cleanded up automatically. See category FE_USERS.

Teamwork with other TYPO3 extensions is proper.
  • OK: Login-Security-Level for frontend users is disabled.
  • OK: "Salted Passwords" for frontend users is disabled.

Teamwork with other TYPO3 extensions isn't proper.
  • ERROR: Login-Security-Level for frontend users is 'rsa'.
Please remove or empty $TYPO3_CONF_VARS['FE']['loginSecurityLevel'] in localconf.php.
Login-Security-Level for frontend users is proper.

Teamwork with other TYPO3 extensions isn't proper.
  • ERROR: Salted passwords for frontend users is enabled.
Please disable the property [Enable SaltedPasswords in the frontend] in the extension manager of Salted Passwords.
Salted passwords for frontend users is disabled.

External SOAP testuser
  • Access data for the external SOAP testuser are missing.
  • Tests with the testuser will failed.
If you like to run tests successfully, please edit the access data of the testuser in the category SOAP TESTUSER.
External SOAP testuser is configured. See category SOAP TESTUSER.
Your current IP
If you get any unexepected result, please enable the DRS - the Development Reporting System. See category DEBUGGING.
The DRS - the Development Reporting System - is enabled. This is a security risk. Please disable it after debugging. See category DEBUGGING.
If you get any unexepected result, please enable SOAP tests. See category DEBUGGING.
SOAP tests are enabled. You can login with the testuser data. This is a security risk. Please disable SOAP tests after debugging. See category DEBUGGING.

Die Konfiguration anderer TYPO3-Erweiterungen ist in Ordnung.
  • OK: Login-Security-Level für Frontend-User ist deaktiviert.
  • OK: "Salted Passwords" für Frontend-User ist deaktviert.

Die Konfiguration anderer TYPO3-Erweiterungen ist nicht in Ordnung.
  • FEHLER: Login-Security-Level für Frontend-User ist 'rsa'.
Bitte entferne oder leere $TYPO3_CONF_VARS['FE']['loginSecurityLevel'] in der Datei localconf.php.
Login-Security-Level für Frontend-User ist in Ordnung.

Die Konfiguration anderer TYPO3-Erweiterungen ist nicht in Ordnung.
  • FEHLER: Salted Passwords für Frontent-User is aktiviert.
Bitte deaktiviere die Eigenschaft [Enable SaltedPasswords in the frontend] im Extension Manager von Salted Passwords.
Salted Passwords für Frontent-User is deaktiviert.
Deine aktuelle IP-Adresse
